mapper.select: SELECT C.order_num, C.user_id, C.book_id, D.book_title, D.book_writer, D.book_price, C.book_cnt, C.order_status FROM ( SELECT A.order_num, B.user_id, A.book_id, A.book_cnt, B.order_status FROM orderlist A, orders B WHERE A.order_num = B.order_num AND A.order_num IN (SELECT order_num FROM orders ORDER BY order_num DESC LIMIT #{start}, 20) ) C, book D WHERE C.book_id = D.book_id;
